Play Together, Stay Together

For packing, unpacking, relaxing, and remembering all the fun you had.

An app for families who love travel and hate to stress.

For families who want a great way to plan and pack and share all the joy we have on family holidays together.

For private information about our trips and our loved ones.

For planning when we're leaving, what we're doing, and having a way to keep the details in a safe place, just for family.

Family Members 3

Andre
Corin
Chandler

Closest Families 2

Nadar Family

Lipinski Family

Features at a glance

Calendar

For flights, check-ins, and the family itinerary.

Contacts

For rentals, hotels, and the name of that really good restaurant.

Photos

For photo albums and videos of the people and places.

Notes

For taking note of all the details and the things we can't forget.

Documents

For the passport, the travel visa, the itinerary and insurance.

Lists

For what to pack, the swimsuits, the extra pair of socks, the travel snacks, and the beach bag.

Stories

For the the story about dinner on the beach, and the last night of the trip.

Sharing

For sharing with parents, siblings, and the whole family.

Request an invite for the first comprehensive app designed for your family. Brought to you by Djed, from the heart of Austin, Texas.
